title: Bitcoin_people
author: Bitcoin_people
created_time: February 13, 2023, 06:03:25 PMLast edit: February 13, 2023, 06:14:42 PM by Bitcoin_people
content: Hello Bitcointalk ❤️On the occasion of World Valentine's Day, we wish all users of BitcoinTalk sincere greetings and endless love. Our forum is very friendly and people from all over the world come to bitcointalk forum for friendly discussion. World Valentine's Day is celebrated on February 14th in most countries of the world after last 1 year. On this Valentine's Day everyone is unwavering in their love to their family and relatives and friends. Also, many wishes and love from me on this World Valentine's Day to all the brothers, sisters and brothers in our bitcointalk forum.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Valentine’s day is a day of love that has been around for centuries, through time Valentine's Day has become the "Hallmark Holiday" for marketing purposes. From kids passing chocolates or little valentine's day note cards to their classmates. To teenagers purchasing a single red rose to give their crush as a secret admirer. To adults lavishly spending big bucks on an arrangement of flowers to diamonds, and maybe a proposal in a fancy restaurant. I can only imagine how much profit, for example a chocolate company or diamond company brings in celebration of Valentine’s Day. To my opinion love is celebrated on a daily basis and giving gifts for love can be given any day out of the year.

comments.author: roksana.hee
comments.body: ❤️ Happy World Valentine's Day!I help a few street children by giving them food. I saw the smiling face of that child to get food. I believe that love is one thing in the world where people appear happy.

comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: Belated Hearts Day guys.Hope you'll all enjoy the celebration with your love ones .
